Events that occurred on 3 January.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1892 - J.R.R. Tolkien is born.
1913 - Tolkien contacts Edith Bratt, who subsequently breaks off her engagement with another man.
1937 - Actor Norman Forsey is born.
1972 - The Tolkien Society wishes J.R.R. Tolkien a happy 80th birthday in The Times.
1972 - The Tolkien Society sends Tolkien a jar of tobacco as a birthday present.
1992 - In the centennial year, Suomen Tolkien-seura ry. (the Finnish Tolkien Society, since 2012 Suomen Tolkien-seura Kontu ry., the Finnish Tolkien Society Kontu) is founded.
1993 - The Danish Tolkien Society, Imladris is founded.
2001 - The Peruvian Tolkien Society is founded.
2014 - Saul Zaentz dies.
Every year - The Tolkien Society's Birthday Toast.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3019:
The Fellowship of the Ring travels south along the Misty Mountains.
